alert.note: Alert for Adams; Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 10:41AM CDT until April 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wisconsin River at Castle Rock Dam affecting Adams and Juneau Counties. .Warm temperatures this week have melted much of the regional snowpack. This snowmelt is routing into larger rivers. Rain this weekend is expected to further increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wisconsin River at Castle Rock Dam. * WHEN...From this morning to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 30,000.0 cfs, Localized flooding occurs near Highway Z and HH downstream of the dam. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:10 AM CDT Friday the flow was 30,217.0 cfs. - Recent Activity...The maximum river flow in the 24 hours ending at 10:10 AM CDT Friday was 30,265.0 cfs. - Forecast...The river is expected to hold steady near 30,000 cfs through Monday evening. - Flood flow is 30,000.0 cfs. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued this evening by 1100 PM CDT.
